interface.name: android_wlegl
interface.description: Interface used in the Android wrapper libEGL to share graphics buffers between the server and the client.

request.name: create_handle
request.description: This creator method initialises the native_handle_t object with everything except the file descriptors, which have to be submitted separately.

request.name: create_buffer

description.summary: Create a wl_buffer from the native handle

request.description:
Pass the Android native_handle_t to the server and attach it to the new wl_buffer object.
The android_wlegl_handle object must be destroyed immediately after this request.

interface.name: android_wlegl_handle
interface.description:
The Android native_handle_t is a semi-opaque object, that contains an EGL implementation specific number of int32 values and file descriptors.
We cannot send a variable size array of file descriptors over the Wayland protocol, so we send them one by one.

interface.name: android_wlegl_server_buffer_handle
interface.description: On creation a server_side_buffer object will immediately send the "buffer_fd" and "buffer_ints" events needed by the client to reference the gralloc buffer, followed by the "buffer" event carrying the wl_buffer object.

event.name: buffer
event.description: This event will be sent after the ints and all the fds have been sent
